orderId.description: The unique identifier of the order that was amended.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who placed the order.

amendedItems.description: A list of items that were amended in the order, each containing product details and updated quantities.

productId.description: The unique identifier of the product.

oldQuantity.description: The original quantity of the product ordered.

newQuantity.description: The new quantity of the product ordered.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the product.

totalPrice.description: The total price for this order item (newQuantity * unitPrice).

orderStatus.description: The current status of the order after the amendment.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order after the amendment.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the order was amended, in ISO 8601 format.
